events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the item is not what I expected. I would like to request a refund because it doesn't match the description on your website.
The issue has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for money back due to an incorrect product received.
The case has been assigned to customer service agent Emily to handle the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund for your recent purchase, and I'm here to help resolve this for you.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. I have also attached a photo showing that the product is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately and you should see the amount back in your account within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the prompt solution and look forward to receiving the refund.
We have processed your refund and closed this case. If you have any further issues, please contact us anytime.
Just following up to confirm that you received your refund successfully. Please let us know if everything is satisfactory.
Since the refund was received and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you for your cooperation.
